org.ssh.math.control

Interface PSDController


  • public interface PSDController
    The Class PSDController. This class contains the functionality of a discrete-time Proportional-, Summation-, and Difference-controller. The implementation is based on the derivation by Cagatay Basdogan (see these slides).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray apply(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray previousControl, java.util.List<org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray> residuals, double proportionalFactor, double summationFactor, double differenceFactor, double deltaTime)
      Computes the control vector based on the supplied previous control signal, error terms (also known as residual or innovation), the supplied proportial-, summation-, and difference-coefficients, and the time since last update.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        static org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray apply(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray previousControl,
                                                  java.util.List<org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray> residuals,
                                                  double proportionalFactor,
                                                  double summationFactor,
                                                  double differenceFactor,
                                                  double deltaTime)
        Computes the control vector based on the supplied previous control signal, error terms (also known as residual or innovation), the supplied proportial-, summation-, and difference-coefficients, and the time since last update.
        Parameters:
        previousControl - The value of the control vector in the previous time-step.
        residuals - A list of error terms in previous time-steps, with the latest error term appearing first.
        proportionalFactor - The coefficient for the proportional controller (known as K_p in the literature).
        summationFactor - The coefficient for the summation controller (known as K_s or K_i in the literature).
        differenceFactor - The coefficient for the difference controller (known as K_d in the literature).
        deltaTime - The change in time since the previous measurement.
        Returns:
        The new control vector, adjusted by the controller.
